Being and army,it has surprised me just how profoundly happy you can be for someone else even when you can't have what you wanted. 1) for the boys who have been missing a part of themselves the last 2 years. We know how badly they've been waiting for this day , for army, for the view from the stage, for the cheers,the energy,the noise, the adrenaline,the vibe. This day is yours BTS! 2) For the Army who were able to make it there at LA. Just grateful and happy to know that they are there-waiting , cheering and doing everything you would have done to welcome the boys back to the stage and make them feel loved ,had you been there.  Overwhelmed for BTS and Army there, though I was here working on a weekend while hoping to see bits from this historic show.

But I'm so so happy for all the ARMYs old and new who could be there, and I'm legitimately crying at this video because I know how much the concert means to the boys and all of us.
